copy.desc13070: Be the first player to get rid of all your cards by matching the colors or numbers.
copy.title: Chat
copy.initText13070:
Welcome to the Crazy Cakes chat log!

Click on a name in the chat log to whisper to that player.
copy.desc13072: Find the pairs and get the most points!
copy.initText13072:
Welcome to the Two For Tea chat log!

Click on a name in the chat log to whisper to that player.
copy.desc13073: Race friendly animals by helping them avoid obstacles and using Power-Ups!
copy.initText13073:
Welcome to the Animal Derby Racing chat log!

Click on a name in the chat log to whisper to that player.
copy.desc13017: Be the first player to get rid of all your cards by matching the colors or numbers. For 2-4 players
copy.desc13018: Test your memory by finding matching pairs. For 2 players
copy.desc13016: Classic fun with a Fairy twist. For 2-12 players
copy.desc13013: Do what Simone does, but only if she says Simone Says! For 2-12 players
copy.desc13012: Things are heating up, don't be the last one holding the popcorn! For 3-12 players

copy.placementModeAlert: Oops! Please place your other party game first.
